DOC.brief_summary: With sensitive urine pregnancy test , woman able confirm early pregnancy . However , approximately one third abortion facility offer abortion less six week pregnancy . Providers may concern unable identify product conception ( POCs ) uterine aspirate early abortion time , cost risk associate follow serum hCG level complete abortion confirm gross inspection . Many provider believe manual vacuum aspiration ( MVA ) cause less destruction pregnancy tissue therefore may increase likelihood identify POCs gross inspection . No published report specifically compare MVA electric vacuum aspiration ( EVA ) detection complete product conception none compare MVA EVA le 6 week pregnancy . We , investigator , propose conduct randomize control trial compare sensitivity MVA EVA detection complete abortion 500 woman pregnancy less 6 week gestation large inner city family planning center . We measure positive identification POCs gross inspection patient subsequently show complete abortion . We hypothesize rate true positive detection POCs high dilation curettage ( D & C ) use MVA EVA .
DOC.brief_title: Study Sensitivity Manual v Electric Aspiration Detect Completed Early Abortion
DOC.criteria: gestational sac size < 12 mm visible sac ( positive pregnancy test ) day surgical abortion medical contraindication outpatient abortion study site able consent suspect ectopic pregnancy ( pelvic mass , unilateral pain , detection ultrasound ) , suspect molar pregnancy , sac vaginal bleeding suspicious complete spontaneous abortion fail medication abortion
